price: 2. Oo sidaa kaaga dejin culeyskii ku saarnaa1,
footnotes: 1. Macnaha waa aan kuu dhaafin oo cafin gefafkaaga kuwii hore iyo kuwa dambeba, ama kaa qaadin culeyskii aad dareemeysey billowgii gaarsiinta iyo fidint diinta.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
